section.title: Purpose
section.p: The purpose of this document is to demonstrate and test references.
In the section entitled , there are a set of sentences that contain exactly one reference to different part of this file and/or another file.
Clicking on each reference link should take you to the exact specified reference anchor.
Note: Clicking on a link within an external file will first display the external file (if found) and then try to take you to the specified reference anchor.
